reviewText: Two very great movies in one, a great choice that i will recommend to anyone. i just love them both and you will never get tired of them
Title: The Green Mile / Forrest Gump

reviewText: Great combo movie deal! Hanks gives great performances in both.He is such a versatile actor.Love a great deal on bluray.
Title: The Green Mile / Forrest Gump

reviewText: Gump's extras disc is not to be found here. You need the full 2 disc. Since I have seen them all and don't plan on revisiting I didn't really care much. You can also find them on youtube or the net most likely. It does have commentary and that is really all I need. The picture looks amazing with a good solid bitrate.Green Mile is more or less a great film with a fairly solid bluray transfer. It does have a bitrate that is pretty low around 18Mbps, but the film is dark and very long, which should help it along some. I wouldn't call it the greatest transfer but for under 10 bucks I am not going to complain much. Most people know enough about these films from other reviews. I'd say both are classics in the genre they are attributed to. Seeing them in hi-def is well worth your time. Just make sure you get a good deal on the set. Mine was 7.99.
Title: The Green Mile / Forrest Gump

Title: The Green Mile / Forrest Gump

reviewText: Movie was as advertised. New in box. Discs were in excellent shape. They played well and it's a good addition.The green mile is a long but heart warming movie about miracles in everyday life.Forrest Gump is an academy award winning drama. Love this movie.The discs were in excellent condition. I've enjoyed watching both these movies. Excellent deal. Highly recommended.
summary: Fantastic Movies. Excellent double disc set.
Title: The Green Mile / Forrest Gump

reviewText: If you have seen VHS or dvd versions of these 2 movies, they were ok, but the Blu-ray experience makes the colors and sound pop even more, not to mention the screen filling scenes.  Viewed on an LCD HD screen, plus 5.1 surround sound, the movie experience was more enjoyable now they're in Blu-ray format.  The price was worth it.
summary: Wow!  Blu-ray makes this movie better
Title: The Green Mile / Forrest Gump

Title: The Green Mile / Forrest Gump

reviewerName: Randall F. Miller III "Randy Miller III"
reviewText: This is a great budget release if you just want The Green Mile and Forrest Gump on Blu-ray minus a few extras.  The individual "Sapphire Series" Blu-ray release of Forrest Gump is a two-disc set; this collection only comes with Disc 1 (which includes the movie, two commentary tracks and a featurette or two).  The Green Mile, on the other hand, is exactly the same as the stand-alone release.  Both feature great A/V presentations and, of course, a handful of solid extras.  But if you're looking for the "total package" Forrest Gump release, you'll have to buy it separately.
summary: Great double feature, but missing extras on Forrest Gump
Title: The Green Mile / Forrest Gump

reviewText: I loved the movie the first time I saw it and then with the added twist to the movie it really drew you into a very nice story. I am very happy to have added it to my collection.My Sony Blu-Ray player that I purchased from Amazon works great and the picture quality is fantastic on my new Samsung 55 inch LED TV.
Title: The Green Mile / Forrest Gump

reviewText: I had always loved Forest Gump and when they were both available I understood why The Green Mile is also a fine film for America. I always fely a bit like Mr. Gump but especcially since my injury. You never really know what you may be good at and help others, but just go out and try and see what happens.
